name: website-html-to-markdown
description: Folder containing the scripts to run the html-to-markdown conversion scripts
author: HashiCorp Design Systems <design-systems@hashicorp.com>

scripts.generate: yarn prepare && yarn identify-sections && yarn split-files && yarn copy-files-as-markdown
scripts.prepare: rm -fr source && mkdir source && mkdir source/original && cp -r ../packages/components/tests/dummy/app/templates/* source/original
scripts.identify-sections:
echo '
==========
Identifying <section> blocks...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js identify-sections ./source/original/**/*.hbs
